answers.author: Joseph Thompson
answers.text:
Mr. Collins,
I recommend you submit an inquiry to the American Planning Association's (APA) Planning Advisory Service (PAS). I used PAS a few times when I was a planner, and they provided me with some really useful information. 
Joe

author: Patrick Collins
text: Is anyone aware of a sign ordinance which calculates the height and area of signs, giving consideration to all the following factors for a single sign: the size of building; size of parcel; street frontage?
title: Sign Ordinance
